casebody.data:
Clyde REED, et al., petitioners,
v.
TOWN OF GILBERT, ARIZONA, et al. No. 13-502. Supreme Court of the United States July 1, 2014. Case below, 707 F.3d 1057 . Motion of Professors Ashutosh Bhagwat, et al. for leave to file a brief as amici curiae granted. Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Ninth Circuit granted.
